subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Bill Cowher's reign as the N.F.L.'s senior coach in tenure ended Friday when he resigned as Steeler's head coach at age 49, saying he wanted to spend more time with his family.
snippet: Bill Cowher's reign as the N.F.L.'s senior coach in tenure ended Friday when he resigned as Steeler's head coach at age 49, saying he wanted to spend more time with his family.
